title: ResumePersonBaseType
description: Represents common data about a person for a ResumeCV.

legalId.description: The legal identifier of a person. The issuer is most likely a country or state.

birthDate.description: The birth date of a person.

citizenship.description: The citizenships that a person holds. This is a legal citizenship in a country (as opposed to nationality which may or may not be a country).

residenceCountry.description: The country (or countries) where a person currently resides.

militaryStatus.description: The military status of a person.

ethnicity.description: The ethnicity (or ethnicities) of a person. Ethnicity is an ethnic group or a social group that shares a common and distinctive culture, religion, and/or language.

primaryLanguage.description: This list is based on Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) RFC 4646 and RFC 4647 for language tags. This tag system is extensible to region, dialect, and private designations. The IANA Language Subtag Registry is a source of the tag values. See http://www.iana.org/assignments/language-subtag-registry
